about.title: About Our Company
about.description: At Art Lighting Inc. we are a team of passionate innovators dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible. Since our founding in 2010, we've been on a mission to create cutting-edge products and services that transform the way people live and work.
about.mission-text: To revolutionize the tech industry and empower people with innovative solutions.
about.values-text: Integrity, Collaboration, Creativity, and Continuous Improvement.
about.team-text: A diverse group of talented individuals who are passionate about making a difference.
about.commitment-text: To deliver exceptional products and services that exceed our customers' expectations.
timeline: 2016 – Art Lighting’s Contribution to National Projects

features.features-description: Experience the perfect fusion of cutting-edge technology and sophisticated design. Our curated collection delivers professional-grade illumination solutions.
features.feature-spotlights-description: Professional-grade indoor and outdoor spotlights engineered for superior illumination. Weather-resistant designs with precision beam control for architectural and landscape applications.
features.feature-chandeliers-description: Luxury chandelier collections combining timeless elegance with cutting-edge LED technology. Transform any space with sophisticated lighting solutions that deliver both beauty and efficiency.
features.feature-delivery-description: Fast-track logistics ensuring your premium lighting solutions arrive within 4 business days. Secure packaging and professional handling guarantee perfect condition upon arrival.
features.feature-cash-description: Enjoy hassle-free payments with our Cash on Delivery option. Pay only when your lighting products arrive safely at your doorstep—no cards, no worries.

misterLed.name: Mister LED
misterLed.description: Innovative LED lighting solutions for every space

dar-misr.ProjectDescription: Dar-Misr is a real estate compound.
dar-misr.ProjectInfor: Dar Misr is a prominent housing project initiated by the Egyptian Ministry of Housing, aiming to provide 150,000 high-quality residential units for middle-income citizens across various new cities in Egypt.
dar-misr.ProjectInfor2: The project is being executed in four phases, offering units with areas ranging from 100 to 150 square meters. Each unit features a distinctive architectural design and superior finishing standards, ensuring a contemporary living experience. Our company contributed to this project by supplying advanced lighting solutions that enhance the aesthetic appeal and functionality of the residential spaces.

tolip.ProjectDescription: Tolip Hotel El Galaa is a luxurious establishment located in Cairo, Egypt.
tolip.ProjectInfor: The hotel comprises three buildings, each five stories high, encompassing a total of 179 rooms. Each room is designed with a blend of modern interiors and classic touches, offering a unique living style with sizes ranging from 38 to 65 square meters. The rooms are equipped with panoramic windows or balconies, air conditioning, mini-bars, and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels.
tolip.ProjectInfor2: Our company provided state-of-the-art lighting solutions to enhance the ambiance and guest experience throughout the hotel's various facilities.

al-majd.ProjectInfor: The Al-Majd Conference Center in Alexandria is a premier venue designed to host a variety of events, including conferences, seminars, and workshops.
al-majd.ProjectInfor2: The center boasts modern architecture and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to accommodate both local and international gatherings. Our lighting solutions were implemented to ensure optimal illumination, creating an inviting atmosphere for all attendees.

mansoura-hospital.ProjectInfor: Mansoura Fever Hospital is a specialized medical facility dedicated to diagnosing and treating infectious diseases. Located in Mansoura, Egypt, the hospital is equipped with advanced medical technologies and staffed by a team of experienced healthcare professionals.
mansoura-hospital.ProjectInfor2: To support the hospital's mission of providing exceptional patient care, our company installed high-quality lighting systems that meet medical standards, ensuring a safe and comfortable environment for both patients and staff.

esna-hospital.ProjectDescription: Esna Hospital serves the community of Esna by offering a wide range of medical services.
esna-hospital.ProjectInfor: Esna Hospital serves the community of Esna by offering a wide range of medical services.
esna-hospital.ProjectInfor2: The hospital is designed to cater to various healthcare needs, featuring multiple departments and specialized units. Our lighting installations were carefully selected to provide adequate illumination across all areas, enhancing visibility and contributing to the overall well-being of patients and healthcare providers.

armant-hospital.ProjectDescription: Armant Hospital is a healthcare institution committed to delivering comprehensive medical services to its community.
armant-hospital.ProjectInfor: Dinner often serves as a moment of peace where families come together to talk through the day. The dining area serves as a focal point in this. While functional lighting is important, creating the feeling of home with the right atmosphere and warmth are just as important. Using the HALO LED ring lights supports this.
armant-hospital.ProjectInfor2: The facility includes emergency units, inpatient wards, and outpatient clinics. Understanding the critical role of proper lighting in medical settings, our company supplied and installed lighting solutions that ensure clarity, reduce eye strain, and promote a healing environment.

maadi-hospital.ProjectDescription: Maadi Hospital is a well-established medical center located in the Maadi district of Cairo. The hospital offers a broad spectrum of healthcare services.
maadi-hospital.ProjectInfor: Maadi Hospital is a well-established medical center located in the Maadi district of Cairo. The hospital offers a broad spectrum of healthcare services supported by modern medical equipment and facilities.
maadi-hospital.ProjectInfor2: To enhance the hospital's infrastructure, we provided lighting systems that not only meet the functional requirements of medical spaces but also contribute to creating a soothing atmosphere for patients.

al-galala-resort.ProjectDescription: Al-Galala Resort is a luxurious destination situated along the Red Sea.
al-galala-resort.ProjectInfor: Al-Galala Resort offers visitors a blend of relaxation and adventure with upscale accommodations, recreational facilities, and breathtaking sea views.
al-galala-resort.ProjectInfor2: Our company was responsible for implementing lighting designs that highlight the resort's architectural beauty, create inviting outdoor spaces, and ensure guests have an unforgettable experience during their stay.

almaza-park.ProjectDescription: Almaza Park is a premier mixed-use development that combines luxury Flood light And bollard.
almaza-park.ProjectInfor: Almaza Park is designed as a modern oasis integrating residential, commercial, and recreational areas. With a focus on sustainability and innovative architecture, the project offers upscale amenities and beautifully landscaped, Flood light, bollard, uplight surroundings to create a vibrant community environment.
almaza-park.ProjectInfor2: Our company played a key role in enhancing the project's aesthetic appeal by delivering cutting-edge lighting solutions. These installations accentuate the elegant design while ensuring energy efficiency and a welcoming atmosphere throughout the development.

al-galala-university.ProjectInfor: The Al-Galala University project features a state-of-the-art lighting system that ensures energy efficiency, enhanced visibility, and safety across the campus. The project incorporates smart LED solutions and modern design elements that highlight the architectural character of the university, making it a benchmark in contemporary educational environments.

al-mynia-university.ProjectInfor: The Al-Mynia University project delivers a complete lighting experience that enhances the academic environment through modern lighting technologies and smart control systems. This project contributes to creating a safe and inspiring educational atmosphere, with a strong focus on sustainability and high-quality standards.

alkaraz.ProjectInfor: The Al-Karaz project exemplifies a design that merges functionality with aesthetics. Advanced lighting systems highlight the architectural features of the building, achieving a balance between efficiency and innovation. This project is a prime example of modern lighting solutions.

auc-university.ProjectDescription: The AUC University project is designed to meet international quality of learning
auc-university.ProjectInfor: The AUC University project is designed to meet international quality  standards by integrating smart technologies with advanced LED systems to enhance the beauty of the campus while preserving its rich architectural heritage. This project reflects a harmonious blend of modern design with tradition.

new-ismalia-compound.ProjectInfor: The New Ismalia Compound  project offers an integrated lighting solution based on the latest energy-saving technologies, adding an element of elegance and comfort to both residential and shared spaces.

wesal-compound.ProjectInfor: The Wesal Compound project features smart lighting solutions that merge elegance with functionality, enhancing the living environment while accentuating the aesthetic aspects of the area. State-of-the-art LED systems are used to ensure maximum efficiency and performance.

contact.aboutUsDescription: We are a team of passionate designers and developers who love creating beautiful and functional products. Our mission is to empower businesses of all sizes to create amazing digital experiences.

values.integrity: Integrity: We are honest, ethical, and transparent in all our dealings.
values.innovation: Innovation: We are constantly exploring new ideas and technologies to stay ahead of the curve.
values.collaboration: Collaboration: We believe in working together to achieve greatness.
values.customerFocus: Customer Focus: We are dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and support.

jetra.title: Introducing Jetra
jetra.subtitle: A new category designed to enhance your experience
jetra.description: We're working on something special. Stay tuned for updates.

indoor.title: Indoor Lighting
indoor.description: Indoor lighting is more than just a source of light. It is also a powerful tool that can be used to create different moods and feelings. Lighting can make a space feel brighter or warmer, more formal or more relaxed.

outdoor.title: Outdoor Lighting
outdoor.description: Outdoor lighting is more than just a way to see in the dark. It is also an important tool for creating ambiance, enhancing safety, and extending the use of outdoor spaces. Well-designed outdoor lighting can make a space feel more inviting, more secure, and more enjoyable.

chandelier.title: Chandelier
chandelier.description: Chandelier lighting is a type of lighting that utilizes a chandelier to provide illumination. Chandeliers are typically suspended from the ceiling and feature multiple arms that support light bulbs or candles. They can be crafted from a diverse range of materials, including crystal, glass, metal, and wood.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to recognize the world about the actual lighting

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leader in shaping human experience through innovative lighting solutions. We envision a world where light actively enhances environments, fostering well-being, productivity, and focus.

products-client.title: Our Best-Selling Products
products-client.description: Discover a wide range of high-quality lighting products designed to meet your needs

news-projects.title: Projects
news-projects.description: We showcase a variety of projects that highlight our expertise and creativity in lighting solutions across different sectors.

product-descriptions.balcomIndoor: Elevate your indoor space with the {Brand} {wattage}W LED luminaire. Crafted with premium {material}, this high-performance light offers {luminousFlux} luminous output, {beamAngle} beam angle.
product-descriptions.balcomOutdoor: Illuminate your outdoor area with the {Brand} {wattage}W {spotlightType} lighting fixture. Built to withstand the elements with its IP{ip} weatherproof rating and durable {material} construction, this fixture delivers {luminousFlux} luminous output and {beamAngle} beam spread. Experience {colorTemperature}
product-descriptions.misterLedChandelierLED: Transform your space with this elegant {Brand} {wattage}W LED chandelier. Featuring a sophisticated {finish} finish and crafted from {material}, this modern fixture combines style with energy-efficient LED technology.
product-descriptions.misterLedChandelierLamp: Enhance your interior with this stunning {Brand} chandelier, designed with {totalWattage}w elegant Lamp counted: {hNumber} with 12W lamp holders. Beautifully crafted from {material} with a refined {finish} finish, this versatile fixture allows you to customize your lighting experience with {lampBase} bulbs.

product-fullDescriptions.balcomIndoor: Elevate your indoor space with the {Brand} {wattage}W LED luminaire. Crafted with premium {material}, this high-performance light offers {luminousFlux} lumens of brightness, a {beamAngle} degree beam angle, and adjustable {colorTemperature}. Enjoy up to {lifeTime} hours of reliable performance, save {energySaving} on your energy bills, and experience exceptional color rendering with a CRI of {cri}. Designed for IP{ip} rated environments, this luminaire features {brandOfLed} LEDs and {electrical} for optimal efficiency.
product-fullDescriptions.balcomOutdoor: Illuminate your outdoor area with the {Brand} {wattage}W {spotlightType} lighting fixture. Built to withstand the elements with its IP{ip} weatherproof rating and durable {material} construction, this fixture delivers {luminousFlux} lumens of brightness and a {beamAngle} degree beam spread. Experience {colorTemperature} color temperature, {lifeTime} hours of long-lasting performance, and {energySaving}% energy efficiency. Equipped with {brandOfLed} LEDs and {electrical}, this fixture provides reliable lighting for any outdoor setting.
product-fullDescriptions.misterLedChandelierLED: Transform your space with this elegant {Brand} {wattage}W LED chandelier. Featuring a sophisticated {finish} finish and masterfully crafted from {material}, this modern fixture combines timeless style with cutting-edge LED technology. Operating at {input}, it offers flexible lighting options with adjustable color temperatures of {colorTemperature}. With an impressive lifespan of {lifeTime} hours, this chandelier provides long-lasting, maintenance-free illumination while adding a touch of luxury to your space.
product-fullDescriptions.misterLedChandelierLamp: Enhance your interior with this stunning {Brand} chandelier, thoughtfully designed with {totalWattage}w Lamp counted: {hNumber} with 12W lamp elegant lamp holders. Beautifully crafted from {material} with a refined {finish} finish, this versatile fixture allows you to customize your lighting experience with {lampBase} bulbs. Operating at {input}, it supports various color temperatures ({colorTemperature}) to suit your mood and decor. The chandelier's durable construction and timeless design make it a perfect centerpiece for your living space, dining room, or entryway. Design flexibility allows you to choose your preferred bulbs (not included) for personalized illumination.

energy.title: Energy Efficiency Champion :
energy.desc: Reduce your electricity bill and your carbon footprint by up to {saving} compared to traditional lighting with this spotlight's exceptional energy efficiency.

lifetime.title: Built to Last :
lifetime.desc: Enjoy years of maintenance-free illumination with the spotlight's extended lifespan, lasting {lifetime} times longer than standard halogen lamps.

weatherproof.title: Weatherproof Warrior :
weatherproof.desc: Embrace outdoor applications, knowing your spotlight is shielded from the elements thanks to its IP {ip} water and dust resistance rating.

indoor.title: Indoor Haven :
indoor.desc: Illuminate your home or office safely with a design crafted for Indoor lighting with IP {ip}. Keep it shielded from outdoor elements to preserve its optimal brightness.

brightness.title: Illuminating Powerhouse :
brightness.desc: Tailor your lighting to any space with the spotlight's impressive brightness of up to {lumens} lumens, perfect for both general and task lighting.

beam.title: Wide-Reaching Illumination :
beam.desc: Achieve uniform and even lighting across larger areas with the spotlight's expansive beam angle of {angle} degrees.

temperature.title: Climate Conqueror :
temperature.desc: Install your spotlight with confidence in diverse environments, as it thrives in temperatures ranging from {range}.

cri.title: True Color Specialist :
cri.desc: Experience exceptional color accuracy with the spotlight's high CRI, ideal for applications demanding precise color rendering.

installation.title: Effortless Installation :
installation.desc: Simplify your setup with the spotlight's user-friendly installation process, requiring no special tools or expertise.

durability.title: Built to Endure :
durability.desc: Invest in lasting performance with the spotlight's robust design, able to withstand shocks and vibrations without compromising function.

warm.title: Warm lighting:
warm.notRecommendedDesc: The soft, warm glow of the LED ceiling lights may be too relaxing and inviting for office environments.
warm.desc: Warm lighting is ideally suited for bedrooms, living rooms, and kitchens. Its gentle, inviting radiance cultivates a cozy ambiance, promoting relaxation and comfort. It helps you relax and improves your sleep.

cool.title: Cool lighting:
cool.boost: Boosts alertness and productivity in work and study spaces.
cool.energy: Creates a vibrant and energetic atmosphere.

white.title: White lighting:
white.recommendedDesc: study spaces and offices as it aids in maintaining focus during work.
white.desc: Cultivates a sophisticated and modern ambiance ideal for creating a neutral and contemporary setting. Perfect for enhancing spaces with its white color temperature.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your most common questions about our lighting products, shipping, returns, and more.

products.title: Products
products.q1: What types of lighting do you offer?
products.a1: We offer a wide range of high-quality lighting solutions, including LED bulbs, pendant lights, floor lamps, table lamps, and more. Our products are designed to provide both functional and aesthetic value, with a focus on energy efficiency and modern, minimalist styles.
products.q2: Do you have any specialty or custom lighting options?
products.a2: Yes, we offer custom lighting solutions for both residential and commercial spaces. Our team of lighting experts can work with you to design and create unique fixtures that meet your specific needs and preferences. Whether you're looking for a one-of-a-kind chandelier or a custom-sized task light, we're here to help bring your vision to life.
products.q3: How do I choose the right lighting for my space?
products.a3: Choosing the right lighting for your space can be a bit of a challenge, but we're here to help. Consider factors like the size and layout of the room, the desired mood and ambiance, and the specific tasks or activities that will be performed in the space. Our product pages include detailed information to help you select the perfect lighting solution, and our customer service team is always available to provide personalized recommendations.

shipping.title: Shipping & Returns
shipping.q1: How long does it take to receive my order?
shipping.a1: We strive to ship all orders within 1-2 business days of receiving them. Delivery times can vary depending on your location, but we typically see orders arrive within 3-5 business days for standard shipping. We also offer expedited shipping options for those who need their items faster.
shipping.a2: We stand behind the quality of our products and want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you're not happy with your order, you can return it within 14 days for a full refund. We'll even cover the cost of return shipping, so you can shop with confidence.
shipping.q3: Do you offer any warranty or guarantee on your products?
shipping.a3: Yes, all of our lighting products come with a 3-year manufacturer's warranty. If you experience any issues with your purchase, simply contact our customer support team and we'll be happy to assist you.

support.title: Technical Support
support.q1: How do I install my new lighting fixture?
support.a1: We provide detailed installation guides with every product. These guides walk you through the step-by-step process, with clear instructions and diagrams. If you run into any issues, our support team is here to help.
support.q2: What if I need to replace a part or accessory?
support.a2: We stock a wide range of replacement parts and accessories for all of our lighting products. Simply contact our customer support team and they'll help you identify the part you need.
support.q3: How can I get in touch with your customer support team?
support.a3: You can reach us by phone at <phoneLink>{phone}</phoneLink> or by email at <emailLink>{email}</emailLink>. We're available Saturday - Thursday, 9.30am to 5.30pm.

company.title: About Our Company
company.q1: What is your company's mission and values?
company.a1: At Art Lighting, our mission is to provide high-quality, energy-efficient lighting solutions that enhance the beauty and functionality of any space. Our core values include honesty, integrity, and respect for the environment.
company.q2: Do you have any certifications or awards?
company.a2: Yes, we're proud to be an Energy Star certified partner, and many of our products have earned the Energy Star label for their efficiency. We've also been recognized for our commitment to sustainability and design excellence.
company.q3: How can I get in touch with your team?
company.a3: You can contact us by phone at <phoneLink>{phone}</phoneLink> or by email at <emailLink>{email}</emailLink>. Our team will be in touch as soon as possible to assist you.

s1.title: 1. Personal Data Collection
s1.q1: What personal information do we collect?
s1.desc: We collect personal information when you create an account or make a purchase on our website. This may include:
list: Names
Email addresses
Shipping addresses
Payment information
Any other personal information provided during account creation or purchases

s2.title: 2. Use of Personal Data
s2.q1: How do we use your personal data?
s2.desc: We use the personal data we collect for the following purposes:
list: To process and fulfill your orders
To improve your user experience on our website
To send promotional offers and updates about our products (with your consent)
To communicate with you about your orders or account
To analyze and improve our services and product offerings

s3.title: 3. Sharing Data with Third Parties
s3.q1: When do we share your data with third parties?
s3.desc: We may share your personal data with third parties under the following circumstances:
list: With shipping companies to deliver your orders
With payment processors to complete transactions
With service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
When required by law or to respond to legal processes
s3.footer: We ensure that any third parties we share data with are bound by confidentiality agreements and are required to respect the security of your personal data.

s4.title: 4. Data Protection
s4.q1: How do we protect your data?
s4.desc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
list: Encryption of sensitive data
Regular security assessments
Limited access to personal information by our employees
Strict confidentiality agreements with any third parties who may have access to your data

s5.title: 5. Your Rights
s5.q1: What rights do you have regarding your personal data?
s5.desc: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
list: The right to access your personal data
The right to request correction of inaccurate data
The right to request deletion of your data
The right to object to or restrict processing of your data
The right to data portability
s5.footer: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy.

s6.title: 6. Contact Us
s6.q1: How can you contact us about this policy?
s6.desc: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please don't hesitate to contact us:
s6.contact: You can reach us by phone at {phone}, or by email at {email}
s6.footer: We're available Saturday - Thursday, 9.30am to 5.30pm, and we'll do our best to respond to your inquiry as quickly as possible.
